title: 246.72 PENALTY FOR UNAUTHORIZED RELEASE OF INFORMATION.
text: Unauthorized release of the patient's name or other uniquely identifying information under sections 246.71 to 246.722 is subject to the remedies and penalties under sections 13.08 and 13.09. This section does not preclude private causes of action against an individual, state agency, statewide system, political subdivision, or person responsible for releasing private data, or confidential or private information on the patient.
